column1: #Text=I just love to read comments for readers that are not Apple fans.
#Text=Making a statement  about Apple product that you will never buy is kind of funny in a way.
#Text=I drive a Honda and a GMC Truck but I never put down a Tesla motors for there electric cars.
#Text=For Apple users the Apple Watch will save me lots of time over the day.
#Text=For example I just got a notification alert from my iPhone.
#Text=If I had the Apple Watch on, I could read the notification  and decide if I need to respond  to it now or later.
#Text=If it was a phone call I could take the call or message back that I was tied up.
#Text=With all the new Apps coming out the things that you will be able to do will be endless.
#Text=From personal Health to Stock Notices real Apple users will have it all.
#Text=But go ahead and tell the world what you think, it makes for good entertainment. ;)
